shopBlindBoxRule: Tengu builds the largest NFT IP in Huaxia Civilization, and each NFT has different rights and interests in the future of the transaction. The Tengu Planet deal is expected to open for trading in the third quarter of 2022.
NFTAndTradeRule: Each is unique and has the same level and interests. The holders can sell and purchase in the trading planet
NFT resources belong to ERC721 assets, so the holders can only buy through a single sale transaction, and batch sale transaction is not supported now
If the seller exchanged the NFT resources for built-in assets before sells them, the NFT resources sold will no longer contain built-in assets, and the buyer cannot exchange and receive them again
